meta.title: Button
meta.description: Use BootstrapVue's <b-button> component for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

props.description: Renders a 100% width button (expands to the width of it's parent container)
The value to set the button's 'type' attribute to. Can be one of 'button', 'submit', or 'reset'
Renders the button with the pill style appearance when set to 'true'
Renders the button with non-rounded corners when set to 'true'
When set to 'true', gives the button the appearance of being pressed. Syncable with the .sync modifier
